mapper.insert: insert into tb_user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_nick, user_phone, user_post, user_addr1, user_addr2) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_nick}, #{user_phone}, #{user_post}, #{user_addr1}, #{user_addr2})
mapper.select: select count(user_id) from tb_user where user_id=#{user_id}
select user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_nick, user_phone, user_post, user_addr1, user_addr2 from tb_user where user_id =#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
select user_id from tb_user where user_name=#{user_name} and user_phone=#{user_phone}
